meanings.definition: A species of grape native to North America.
meanings.sent1: Labrusca is a type of grape that grows in North America.
meanings.sent2: The labrusca grape is known for its unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: I tried a labrusca grape for the first time and it tasted like a burst of sunshine!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as biting into a juicy labrusca grape.
meanings.sent5: The vineyard was filled with rows of labrusca grapes, each one a tiny treasure.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the labrusca grape.
meanings.sent1: The labrusca vines twisted gracefully around the trellis.
meanings.sent2: She described the wine as having a labrusca aroma.
meanings.sent3: The labrusca-themed party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: His labrusca-colored shirt matched perfectly with the vineyard backdrop.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sweet scent of labrusca blossoms in full bloom.

meanings.definition: A wine made from labrusca grapes.
meanings.sent1: I brought a bottle of labrusca to the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The labrusca had a rich, fruity taste that lingered on the palate.
meanings.sent3: The labrusca wine was so good, it disappeared faster than I expected!
meanings.sent4: The deep red color of the labrusca wine reminded me of a summer sunset.
meanings.sent5: The labrusca wine paired perfectly with the cheese platter, enhancing the flavors.
